description: This Dart file defines the OrdersScreen widget in a Flutter app, displaying a list of orders with details and handling empty state. It includes UI components like ListView, ExpansionTile, and custom GlassContainer, and interacts with the OrdersProvider for state management.

classes.name: OrdersScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying list of orders or a message if none exist.

classes.name: _OrderCard
classes.description: A widget representing a single order card with expandable details.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the OrdersScreen and _OrderCard, displaying order list or details.
